column26: Illumina HiSeq 2000 sequencing; Direct RNA Sequencing of polyadenylated RNA & high-depth Illumina strand-specific, short read RNA-seq of a stably RNAi-silenced nuclear 5’-3’ exonuclease XRN3 mutant line in Arabidopsis thaliana
column27: Direct RNA Sequencing of polyadenylated RNA & high-depth Illumina strand-specific, short read RNA-seq of a stably RNAi-silenced nuclear 5’-3’ exonuclease XRN3 mutant line in Arabidopsis thaliana
column28: Illumina HiSeq 2000 sequencing; Direct RNA Sequencing of polyadenylated RNA & high-depth Illumina strand-specific, short read RNA-seq of a stably RNAi-silenced nuclear 5’-3’ exonuclease XRN3 mutant line in Arabidopsis thaliana
column29: Protocols: Seedlings were harvested 14 day A. thaliana Columbia-0 background  seeds were sown aseptically in MS10 plates and are then stratified for 2 days before they are transferred to growth room. Growth room set up is long days (16h light/8h dark), temperature 21deg C which gives 23deg C on the shelf when lights are on. Total RNA extracted with the RNAeasy kit from Nimblegen. ERCC spike-ins were added to the total RNA at a 1:100 dilution and the resulting total RNA + spike-in mixture was stored at -80°C in advance of library preparation. Libraries were prepared using Illumina Tru-seq ribo-minus plant strand-specific protocol including barcoding.

column26: Illumina HiSeq 2000 paired end sequencing; Direct RNA Sequencing of polyadenylated RNA & high-depth Illumina strand-specific, short read RNA-seq of a stably RNAi-silenced nuclear 5’-3’ exonuclease XRN3 mutant line in Arabidopsis thaliana
column27: Direct RNA Sequencing of polyadenylated RNA & high-depth Illumina strand-specific, short read RNA-seq of a stably RNAi-silenced nuclear 5’-3’ exonuclease XRN3 mutant line in Arabidopsis thaliana
column28: Illumina HiSeq 2000 paired end sequencing; Direct RNA Sequencing of polyadenylated RNA & high-depth Illumina strand-specific, short read RNA-seq of a stably RNAi-silenced nuclear 5’-3’ exonuclease XRN3 mutant line in Arabidopsis thaliana
column29: Protocols: Seedlings were harvested 14 d after transfer to 24 °C. A. thaliana Columbia-0 background seeds were sown on solid MS10 medium, stratified for 2 d at 4 °C and grown in a controlled-environment room at a constant 24 °C under 16-h light and 8-h dark conditions. Total RNA was purified using an RNeasy kit. No subsequent polyadenylation of the RNA was performed, and further procedures in preparation for sequencing were done as described in Ozsolak et. al., 2009, Nature No library prep needed
